Ingredients 

 1) Deselect All 
 2) 1/4 cup red wine vinegar 
 3) 2 tablespoons sugar 
 4) 2 tablespoons peanut or vegetable oil, eyeball it 
 5) 1 sack, 16 ounces, shredded cabbage mix for slaw salads 
 6) 1 teaspoon salt 
 Full recipe : www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/rachael-ray/oil-and-vinegar-slaw-recipe-1942496

Ingredients 

 1) Deselect All 
 2) Four 5-ounce center-cut salmon fillets (about 1-inch thick) 
 3) 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice 
 4) 3 tablespoons olive oil 
 5) Kosher salt 
 6) 1 bunch kale, ribs removed, leaves very thinly sliced (about 6 cups) 
 Full recipe : www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/food-network-kitchen/pan-seared-salmon-with-kale-and-apple-salad-recipe-3361718

Ingredients


1) Four 4-ounce boneless, skinless chicken breast cutlets

2) Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

3) 1/3 cup whole wheat flour

4) 1 1/2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil

5) 3/4 cup low-sodium chicken broth

6) 1/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes (not packed in oil; not rehydrated), finely chopped or very thinly sliced

Ingredients

 1) 12 cups water

2) 1 1/2 cups quinoa, rinsed

3) 5 pickling cucumbers, peeled, ends trimmed, and cut into 1/4-inch cubes

4) 1 small red onion, cut into 1/4-inch cubes

5) large tomato, cored, seeded, and diced

Full Recipe: www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/quinoa-salad-recipe0-1946649

Ingredients


1) 1 cup frozen mixed berries

2) 3/4 cup orange juice

3) 1/4 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt

4) 1 frozen ripe banana

5) 1 teaspoon honey, optional

Ingredients

 1) 3/4 cup instant grits

2) Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

3) 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese

4) 3 tablespoons unsalted butter

5) 1/4 pounds medium shrimp, peeled and deveined (tails intact)

6) 2 large cloves garlic, minced
